Out of the four films, I'd highly recommend "The Relic". This movie is a thrilling mix of horror and mystery, set in a Chicago museum where an ancient lizard-like god is causing chaos. Notable actors like Tom Sizemore, Penelope Ann Miller, and John Kapelos bring the story to life. If you enjoy suspenseful plot twists and intriguing characters, I think you'll find "The Relic" fascinating!

Another film that might catch your interest is "Unleashed". This action-drama stars Jet Li and Morgan Freeman and tells the story of a man enslaved by the mob since childhood who tries to start a new life after escaping his captors. The movie combines intense action scenes with a moving character development journey that I believe you'll find captivating. Enjoy your cinematic exploration!
